title: Vinted Scraper
description: Scrape product listings from Vinted marketplace. Provide a catalog URL or use search parameters to find items.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Vinted catalog or search URL (e.g., https://www.vinted.com/catalog/1904-women).

keyword.title: Search keyword
keyword.description: Product search keyword(s), e.g., 'vintage jeans', 'Nike shoes', 'designer bag'.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of results
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of product listings to collect.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of catalog pages to visit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Direct catalog URLs work with datacenter (SHADER). Keyword searches require RESIDENTIAL proxies.
